documentation.title: Import Statement
documentation.standard: Import use statements must not begin with a leading backslash.

code.title: Valid: Import statement doesn't begin with a leading backslash.

code_comparison.code:
<?php

use ECSPrefix202408\Vendor\Package\ClassA as A;

class FooBar extends A
{
    // Class content.
}

code.title: Invalid: Import statement begins with a leading backslash.

code_comparison.code: \ECSPrefix202408\Vendor\Package\ClassA as A; class FooBar extends A { // Class content. }
